text: Mauricio Mata (12 April 1939 – 15 October 2020) was a Mexican cyclist. He competed in three events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in San Luis Potosí, Mexico. Mata died on 15 October 2020 in Aguascalientes, Mexico at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican cyclists Category:Olympians for Mexico Category:People from San Luis Potosí
title: Mauricio Mata
